title: The Perfect Idol’S Handbook Of Falling In Love
alternative_title: Falling in Love For Real ; The Perfect Idol's Handbook of Falling in Love ; Wanmei Ai Dou Lunxian Shouce ; Cẩm Nang Thu Phục Idol Hoàn Mỹ ; Wánměi Ài Dòu Lúnxiàn Shǒucè ; 完美爱豆沦陷手册
status: Falling in Love For Real ; The Perfect Idol's Handbook of Falling in Love ; Wanmei Ai Dou Lunxian Shouce ; Cẩm Nang Thu Phục Idol Hoàn Mỹ ; Wánměi Ài Dòu Lúnxiàn Shǒucè ; 完美爱豆沦陷手册
description:
Description :
        Mystyle, a girl group that has been a tepid group for three years, announced on its third anniversary that it will be splitting up. The team leader with a sexy and hot style is the former leader Windy, while the team with a sweet and lively style t’s the airborne captain Wangshu. Wangshu seems to be well-behaved and sensible. She clings to Windy every day. In fact, she seems to have a different kind of affection for this sister…
